text: Jean-Marie Lehn (born September 30, 1939) is a French chemist. He received the 1987 Nobel Prize in Chemistry together with Donald James Cram and Charles J. Pedersen. He specializes in organic chemistry and supramolecular chemistry. He was born in Rosheim, France. Lehn was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1988. == Related pages == *List of Nobel Prize winners in Chemistry == References == Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:French chemists Category:French Nobel Prize winners Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:People from Bas-Rhin
title: Jean-Marie Lehn
